title: Multimedia mobile learning for elementary biology concept comprehension

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic biological terminology and elementary-level science concepts
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning requiring module design that prioritizes audio explanations and visual materials over text

learning_goals: Accurately explain ≥85% of core elementary biology concepts (plant structures, animal classification, ecosystems, etc.)
Enhance cognitive integration of biological phenomena through visual-auditory processing using multimedia resources
Effectively utilize ≥90% of learning modules combining voice descriptions (text alternatives) with images/videos in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
